events.message: The insured reported a rear-end collision involving their vehicle on highway exit 12 around 8 PM yesterday.
Claim has been classified under Auto Accident due to keywords and nature of vehicle damage described by the claimant.
A claims agent has been assigned to handle the vehicle collision claim to ensure timely processing.
Acknowledgement of the claim has been sent to the insured with instructions on next steps and necessary documents.
Request sent for police report, photos of vehicle damage, and repair estimates to evaluate the collision impact.
Insured has submitted all requested documents including detailed photos and the police report for the accident claim.
The claims investigation team has begun reviewing submitted documents and consulting with repair shops.
Investigation concluded with confirmation that the vehicle damages are consistent with the reported collision scenario.
A settlement offer covering repair costs and related expenses has been prepared and sent to the insured for review.
The insured responded positively to the settlement offer and expressed satisfaction with the claims process so far.
Final approval for the claim has been issued to facilitate prompt payment for vehicle repairs.
Payment for the approved amount has been issued to the insuredâ€™s designated bank account to cover repair costs.
The auto accident claim file has been closed following successful issuance of payment and confirmation from the insured.
The claim documents and investigation records have been archived for future reference and compliance purposes.
